Immortality: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy, and it is the key to their survival. If humans were able to photosynthesize, they would be able to convert sunlight into energy, which could potentially lead to immortality.

Ability to communicate with plants: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy, and it is the key to their communication with other plants. Ability to control the weather: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy, and it is the key to their ability to control the weather.
